Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: உறல்முறையான் உட்பகை தோன்றின் இறல்முறையான் ஏதம் பலவும் தரும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: If there appears internal hatred in a (king's) family; it will lead to many a fatal crime.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A royal family ('உறல்முறை') is depicted. Within this family, a secret enmity has taken root, shown as a serpent coiled around the family tree.
Layered_Composition.Midground: This internal enmity is shown to beget fatal crimes. The serpent's influence causes family members to act against each other in deadly ways—one brother is shown poisoning another's cup, a sister is shown plotting with an enemy.
Layered_Composition.Background: These acts lead to a cascade of fatal disasters ('இறல்முறையான் ஏதம் பலவும்') for the entire dynasty, culminating in its ruin. The family tree itself is shown withering and dying from the serpent's poison.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: If internal enmity arises within a ruling family, it will give birth to a chain reaction of fatal evils that will destroy the dynasty.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The serpent of internal enmity coiled around the family tree is the central metaphor. The various acts of betrayal and murder show the 'many fatal evils' that result.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A dark, conspiratorial, and tragic light. The serpent has a venomous glow. The scenes are full of shadow and intrigue. The colors are those of royalty—golds and purples—but they are tarnished and decaying.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A multi-paneled narrative image, like a tapestry, showing the different fatal crimes stemming from the central enmity.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with the rich but dark detail of a Shakespearean tragedy.
